casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
SOTO S236164 Supreme Court of California October 12, 2016 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petitions for review are granted. The issues to be briefed and argued are limited to (1) whether the trial court erred in instructing the jury, as the Court of Appeal found, and (2) if so, whether the error was prejudicial.
